name: Mother Giftbox - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: Here's to you, Mom! A special gift box for her to discover our Original Cuvée 0.0%: White: Colombard and Sauvignon blanc - Fruity aromas and gourmet crispness. Sparkling: Colombard - Fine and round with sharp and tangy bubbles

name: White wines - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: Un Colombard, un Chardonnay, un Blanc de Noir pétillant... La Cuvée Révolutionnaire en blanc pour accompagner vos fruits de mer, vos viandes blanches, vos plateaux de fromage et vos meilleurs desserts.

name: Giftbox Signature
description: Offrez une expérience gustative unique à vos proches pour les fêtes. Notre coffret signature sublime les repas, des plus simples aux plus élaborés.

name: White & Rosé Discovery Box - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: The perfect box to refresh & revolutionize the summer months! In this set you'll find two wines from our Revolutionary Cuvée:The White: Colombard - fruity, with a lovely, balanced freshnessThe Rosé: Gros Manseng, Merlot - with notes of fresh ripe red fruit and a hint of citrus.

name: La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: C'est la cuvée prestige de moderato. Déjà à la carte de restaurants gastronomique, elle est issue de grands vins, désalcoolisés en douceur pour conserver toute leur structure, leurs arômes et le plaisir du vin d'origine.

name: Le Chardonnay  - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: Finally, a great Chardonnay, well-balanced with its typical white fruit notes, a subtle woody touch for a unique melting and length. This rare wine, carefully selected with our oenologists, has been distilled at low temperature to remove alcohol while preserving its incomparable typicity and richness (<0.5 alcohol).

name: White & Red Discovery Box - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: A special box to discover our Revolutionary Cuvée,one-of-a-kind alcohol-free wines White: Colombard - fruity, with a beautiful balanced freshness & the Red: Merlot & Tannat - ripe red fruit and well-rounded tannins
duplicateWith: White & Rosé Discovery Box - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire

name: Le Colombard - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: A typical grape variety from Gascony, our colombard is responsible for our non-alcoholic white (<0.5%), which is highly aromatic and slightly acidic and a true representative of the region.

name: Le Pétillant - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: A unique non-alcoholic sparkling wine (<0.5%), Blanc de Noir, from the emblematic Merlot grape variety of the Bordeaux region with roundness and fine tangy bubbles</ span>

name: Le Pinot Noir - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: Pinot Noir, an iconic and subtle grape variety.Sourced from southern terroirs, it took us several months of work and delicate barrel aging to develop a rich and balanced character.A true tribute to finesse — the pleasure of wine, without the alcohol! (<0.5% ABV)

name: Le Rosé - La Cuvée Originale
description: An original blend of two grape varieties typical of Gascony for a fruity and round rosé with lovely freshness!

name: Le Rosé - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: A unique blend of Gascony grape varieties with Merlot and Gros Manseng, for an alcohol-free rosé (<0.5%) full of deliciousness and roundness. Fresh and fruity for a bit of sunshine all year round

name: Le Blanc - La Cuvée Originale
description: Two emblematic grape varieties from Gascony that make for a fresh and fruity dry white wine, with a beautiful balance on the palate.

name: Le Merlot-Tannat - La Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: The classic velvety smoothness of Merlot and the structure of  Tannat, an emblematic grape of Gascogny for a balanced and finley tannic alcohol-free red (<0.5%)

name: Le Pétillant - La Cuvée Originale
description: A typical grape variety from the Gascony region, for an original sparkling wine, full of roundness and lovely freshness.
